title: Sesame chicken stir-fry
time: Takes 20 minutes to make, 20 minutes to cook
description: This quick and easy chicken stir-fry dish is offset by the zesty sesame stir-fry sauce, it’s a must for mid-week mains.
ingredients: 1 large chicken breast, cut into 1cm wide strips
Bunch of spring onions, finely sliced
Grated zest and juice of 1 small orange
Thumb-size piece of fresh ginger, grated
1 tsp soy sauce, plus extra to serve

method.Step 1: Heat a splash of oil in a wok. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes until golden and cooked through.

method.Step 2: Meanwhile mix the ingredients for the stir-fry sauce in a bowl. Add the chicken to the stir-fry sauce, mix, then return the wok to the heat.

method.Step 3: Make sure the wok is hot, then add a splash of oil. Add the cabbage and stir-fry for 5 minutes until wilted. Add the beansprouts and remaining veg, then fry for another 5 minutes.

method.Step 4: Return the chicken and the sauce to the wok with the noodles and cook for 1-2 minutes until hot. Serve immediately with extra soy sauce.
